full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Advance Procurement Notice for UPS Replacement Batteries

### Notice of Amendment

The Shared Services Canada (SSC) has amended the Advance Procurement Notice (APN) to indicate that the Request for Standing Offers (RFSA) will be published in December 2022 or January 2023.

### Notice of Questions and Answers

#### Part 1

*   A new document titled "Questions and Answers - Questions et réponses - (Part 3 - partie 3)" has been published.

#### Part 2

*   A new document titled "Questions and Answers - Questions et réponses - (Part 2 - partie 2)" has been published.

### Tender Description

The Advance Procurement Notice aims to inform interested original equipment manufacturers (OEMs) of UPS batteries and their approved resellers that SSC will issue a solicitation in May 2022 for the replacement batteries. These replacement batteries will be delivered to various sites across Canada and are expected to meet the following characteristics:

*   Rack-mounted single-phase, 5kVA capacity or greater
*   Rack-mounted three-phase, 5kVA capacity or greater
*   Standalone single-phase, 5kVA capacity or greater
*   Standalone three-phase, 5kVA capacity or greater

## Contracting Information

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Shared Services Canada
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K0A 0C3, Canada
*   **Contact Information**:
    *   **Name**: Agnieszka Kowalska
    *   **Email**: agnes.kowalska2@ssc-spc.gc.ca
    *   **Phone**: 343-551-9034
*   **Technical Documents**:
    *   [Advance Procurement Notice Re-issue - November 30 2022](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/11/30/1fc7b1c5f1bf42143157ffcee47fb055/advance_procurement_notice_re-issue_-_november_30_2022.pdf)
    *   [Questions and Answers - Questions et réponses - (Part 3 - partie 3)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/01/284eee267d2352722707634bec7e45f0/questions
